We have a dedicated JSCC service called Career Adviser to help you navigate your career options and consciously pave your way to new career heights. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCJSCC/Career+adviser\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Career Adviser\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" offers materials and advice for development in one of the key career sectors: SA, ASE, RM, PM, DM. Visit the service page to find the right expert and schedule a personal career consultation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rHave you ever been in a project that involves a complicated technical issue and no one from your team knows how to handle it? Or maybe you have lost interest in your core skill but are not sure what you'd like to do next? Or, perhaps, you know what you want to learn but don't know where to start or what's more important? Our \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCJSCC/Skill+Advising\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Skill Advising \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"service is the perfect solution. After you leave a request with a description of your issue, a more experienced team member will get in touch with you and provide the necessary consult.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWe've compiled a list of open positions across the JS practice and created an \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCJSCC/Opportunity+Map\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Opportunity Map\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to make it easy to understand how you can grow and develop beyond your project activities. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
